directions: Cook onion, mushrooms and bacon in medium saucepan over medium-high heat until bacon is crisp; drain. Add pasta, sauce, peas and pepper; cook, stirring occasionally, for 1 minute.
ingredients: 1 (9 ounce) package BUITONI® Refrigerated Spinach Cheese Tortellini, prepared according to package directions
1 (10 ounce) container BUITONI® Refrigerated Alfredo Sauce
1/4 cup BUITONI® Freshly Shredded Parmesan Cheese
title: Tortellini Alfredo with Peas and Bacon
